p: Subsequent to publication of this study, we obtained crystals that yielded slightly better diffraction data for the TmTsaBDE complex (Table 1). These data resulted in improved electron density maps and allowed us to identify and correct a few errors in the previously deposited structure (originally deposited as PDB 6FPE). The latter (which is still available for download and comparison, at https://www.rcsb.org/structure/removed/6FPE) has been superceded by a new set of revised coordinates (PDB 6S84).
